62008.「よく来てくれたでンス。 \n どうぐ使いとして さらに強くなったようで\n さ:
<pc>! I'm glad to thee you're back.
It lookth like you've really gotten the hang
of being an Item Mathter.

62009.「ちょっと お話が あるでンスから\n こっちへ 来てほしいでンスよ。:
Come here, let me thee you up clothe. We've
got a lot to dithcuth.

62010.「ご主人さまをさらった 隊長ゴルゴンザでンスが\n 当分は 魔界に戻れないと思う:
That Captain Gorgonza, who kidnapped Mathter,
probably won't be able to return to the
Demon World for a while.

62011.「というのも 魔界に戻るためには\n 魔界へ通じる門を開く必要が あるでンスが\:
You thee, it taketh thome time to open the
gate that leadth to and from the Demon
World.

62012.「今頃 奴らは この世界のどこかで\n 魔界への門を 開いているはずでンスよ……:
But I'm thure they're out there thomewhere,
preparing to open that gate to return to
the Demon World...

62013.「この間に ご主人さまを 助けなくては\n ならないでンスが 今の <pc>さん:
We have to take advantage of thith time to
find and rethcue Mathter, but I'm afraid
you're thill not throng enough.

62014.「でも ご主人さまが編み出した\n どうぐ使いの必殺技を 習得すれば\n きっと:
However, if you learn the Item Mathter'th
thpethial technique, I'm thure you'll be
able to find a path to victory!

62015.「お願いでンス <pc>さん。\n ゴルゴンザに勝つために 必殺技を\n 習得し:
Pleathe, pleathe, <pc>. It'th all
up to you. Will you learn that thpethial
technique?

62016.「魔物を従えている状態で\n ゴブル砂漠西などにいる <%sEV_QUE_NAM:
I want you to defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Erazor Blades in Goble
Desert West with a monthter in your party.

62017.「必殺技を習得するには この特訓が\n どうしても 必要になるでンス。\n それ:
Thith training ith neccethary to learn the
thpecial move. But I have faith in your
thuctheth.

62018.「ご主人さまが編み出した どうぐ使いの必殺技を\n 習得すれば 隊長ゴルゴンザと:
If you learn the Item Mathter'th thpethial
technique, I'm thure you'll be able to find a
path to victory!

62019.「ただ その前に 必殺技習得の準備として\n やってきてほしいことが あるでンス:
But before that, there'th tomething I need
you to do in preparation to learn it.

62020.「魔物を従えている状態で\n ゴブル砂漠西などにいる <%sEV_QUE_NAM:
I want you to defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Erazor Blades in Goble
Desert West with a monthter in your party.

62021.「必殺技を習得するには この特訓が\n どうしても 必要になるでンスよ……。\n:
<pc>, thith training ith ethential
to mathering the tphethial move. But I know
you can pull it off.

62022.「おお！ 特訓をこなしたでンスね！\n では 最後の仕上げでンスよ！:
Oh! You've pulled it off! That meanth it'th
time for the finithing toucheth!

62023.「<pc>さん！ マスターキーを\n 取り出してもらってもいいでンスか！？<ye:
<pc>! May I take a look at your
Mathter Key?<yesno><close>

62025.「<pc>さんが 特訓をこなしたおかげで\n キーに パワーが たまったでンス。:
Thankth to your hard work with
thith training, the Key hath accumulated
power, and the limiter hath been removed.

62026.「さあ その マスターキーを使って\n ボクの二段目の引き出しを 開くでンス。\:
Now, use that Mathter Key to open my thecond
drawer. Don't be thy, there'th thomething
for you inthide...

62027.<pc>は タンスの引き出しを開け\n中に入っていた本を 取り出した！:
<pc> opens Wardrobe's second drawer
and removes a book from inside!

62028.「その本は ご主人さまが長年の研究の末に\n 編み出したという どうぐ使いの必殺:
That'th the manual to learn the Item
Mathter'th thpecial technique. Mathter poured
hith heart and thoul into writing that.

62029.「その本を読めば どうぐ使いの必殺技が\n 習得できるはずでンスよ。:
All you need to do ith read it, though.
No yearth of rethearch nethethary.

62030.<pc>は\n『どうぐ使い必殺技マニュアル』と\n書かれた本を 読んだ。:
<pc> read a book called
"The Item Master's Masterful Method".

62032.「その必殺技があれば 隊長ゴルゴンザとの\n 戦いを 優位に進められるはずでンス:
That thould give you the upper hand againth
that thlimy Captain Gorgonza.

62033.「……と言いたいところでンスが\n すでに 必殺技を習得してるようでンスね。\n:
Lookth like you've already learned the
thpethial move. In that cathe, take thith
inthtead.

62034.「前に ご主人さまには 夢があると言ったのを\n 覚えてるでンスか？:
Do you remember when I told you that Mathter
had a dream?

62035.「じつは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すことこそが\n ご主人さまの夢だったでンスよ。\n:
Actually, Mathter's dream is to defeat
Captain Gorgonza. And hith dream... ith my
dream too.

62036.タンスが 自分の戸棚を開けると\nなんと たくさんの どうぐが飛び出した！:
Wardrobe's drawers fly open and out pop
bunches and bunches of items!

62037.「ボクの中には ご主人さまが集めてた\n アストルティアで使われている どうぐが:
Inside me are many of the items used in
Astoltia that Master collected.

62038.「魔界にいた頃から ご主人さまは\n この世界の住人が作った どうぐを\n 集め:
Ever since he was in Demon World, Master had a
hobby of collecting items made by the
inhabitants of this world.

62039.「この世界のどうぐに魅せられた ご主人さまは\n やがて 好きが高じて どうぐの:
The master was fascinated by the items of this
world, and his love for them eventually led
him into researching their abilities...

62040.「だけど 魔界の連中は 意味のない研究などせず\n 強化薬の開発を続けるよう い:
However, the people of Demon World always, always, always insisted to the master to continue the development of enhancement drugs
instead of meaningless research...

62041.「ある日 ご主人さまは 自分の研究の価値を\n 証明すべく どうぐを使った 自作:
One day, in order to prove the value of his research, the master challenged Gorgonza to a battle with a battle weapon of his own making
using items.

62042.「その戦闘兵器こそが このボク……\n バトルガジェット１号 タンスだったでンス:
That battle weapon was me...Battle Gadget No.
1, Wardrobe.

62043.「ボクは ご主人さまの期待に応えようと\n 隊長ゴルゴンザと戦ったでンスが ボロ:
I fought Captain Gorgonza to live up to my
master's expectations, but I was beaten so
badly that I could never fight again...

62044.「敗北を喫した ご主人さまは アイツに勝つには\n どうぐの扱いに長けた アスト:
The defeated master decided that the only way to defeat him was to enlist the help of the residents of Astoltia, who were skilled in
handling items.

62045.「そして ご主人さまとボクは この世界に来て\n 最初に出会った者に キーを与え:
And the master and I gave the key to the first
person we met when we came to this world. That
was <pc>.

62046.「<pc>さん……。ご主人さまの研究を\n カケラも理解しようとしなかった あの:
...I would like you to show the strength of your item master to that giant who didn't try to understand even a shred of your
master's research.

62047.「今のうちに 修行して \n あの巨人を倒す 心の準備ができたら\n また ここ:
I want you to train while you still can, and
when you're ready to defeat that giant, I want
you to come back here again.

62048.「ボクは それまでに\n 奴らの居場所を 探しておくでンス。: I'll try to locate them before then.

62049.「ご主人さまは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すという夢を\n <pc>さんに 託したでンス:
The master entrusted <pc> with the
dream of defeating Captain Gorgonza. It is my
dream too...

62050.「ご主人さまの研究の価値を カケラも\n 理解しようとしなかった あの巨人に\n:
I want you to show the strength of your item master to that giant who didn't understand even a shred of the value of your master's
research.

62051.「修行して もっと強い どうぐ使いになったら\n また ここに戻ってきてほしいで:
I hope you'll come back here when you've trained and become a stronger item master. In the meantime, I'm going to find out where they
are!

62052.「ご主人さまは 隊長ゴルゴンザを倒すという夢を\n <pc>さんに 託したでンス:
The master entrusted <pc> with the
dream of defeating Captain Gorgonza. It is my
dream too...

62053.「ご主人さまの研究の価値を カケラも\n 理解しようとしなかった あの巨人に\n:
I want you to show the strength of your item master to that giant who didn't understand even a shred of the value of your master's
research.

62054.「あの巨人を倒す 心の準備ができたら\n また ここに戻ってきてほしいでンスよ。:
I want you to come back here when you're ready
to defeat the Titans. In the meantime, I want
you to find out where they are!

62234.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！\n では 必殺技を習得するための準備として\n や:
Oh! Thank you! Now, there is something I want
you to do in preparation for learning the
special moves.

62235.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！\n ありがたいでンスが…………: Oh! Thank you! Thank you, but...

62236.「<pc>さんは 頼まれごとで\n いっぱいでンスね……。でも 急ぎでンスから\:
I've got a lot of requests for the
<pc>... but I'm in a hurry, so I'll
get that taken care of quickly!

62237.「そうでンスか……。でも この世界で\n 頼れるのは <pc>さんだけでンス。\:
I see... but the only thing we can rely on in
this world is <pc>. I'll be waiting
for you, believing in you.

62238.「最後の仕上げには マスターキーが\n どうしても 必要なんでンス。\n ツベコ:
I really need the Master Key for the final
touches. Don't be shy, just get it out of
here.
